data.name: This Girl Does Not Exist
data.detailed_description:
NONE OF THESE GIRLS DO NOT EXIST!!!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This Girl Does Not Exist is the first game of its kind. It is a game full of beautiful girls .. and none of them exist! They were also not made by a human but generated by an AI. Dive into this vibrant colorful puzzle game and add girls to your gallery as you discover how they were generated!

The game is full of beautiful images but none of them were painted by human, nor were they 3D modelled. They were all generated by an AI.

The gameplay consist of putting together sentences out of multiple possible words, unlocking girls and adding them to your gallery and also deciding for each girl if you like it or not - Tinder style! The goal is to figure out what unique word combination, aka "prompt" was used to generate the image. Your first few levels will probably be a trial and error, but with practice and with each level, you will understand more and more how the AI works and what words lead to which result.

Was it "Beautiful girl sitting on a beach with a mystery in her eyes" or rather "young woman who is contemplating the fate of the universe while she is sunbathing"?

Features:
  • Fun and unique puzzle game with coming up combinations of words
  • Exactly like the AI, you will learn the game as you'll go
  • Everything you see in the game is purely AI GENERATED (even the backgrounds)
  • Over 100 beautiful woman of all shapes, colors, moods, sizes, styles
  • Unlockable gallery


Gameplay:
  • Decide for a image of girl if you like her
  • If yes, solve her puzzle by trying to reproduce an unique word prompt
  • Combine words into the prompt and then check your result
  • If you were correct, she will be added to your gallery!

data.short_description: This Girl Does Not Exist is the first game of its kind. It is a game full of beautiful girls .. and none of them exist! They were also not made by a human but generated by an AI. Dive into this vibrant colorful puzzle game and add girls to your gallery as you discover how they were generated!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
